TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HttpCacheVaryByContentEncodings extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供一种类型安全的方式来设置 类的 属性。

span.span: Provides a type-safe way to set the property of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于指定是否缓存动态压缩的响应。The property is used to specify whether dynamically compressed responses are cached. 缓存动态压缩的响应意味着仅在第一次请求资源 (或在应用程序重新启动之后) 和缓存项过期时, 压缩开销为一次。Caching dynamically compressed responses means that the cost of compression is incurred only one time, during the first request for the resource (or after an application restart) and when the cache item expires. 如果有多个缓存的资源响应, 则类的属性标识 ASP.NET 用于唯一标识响应变化的请求标头参数。The property of the class identifies which request header parameters ASP.NET uses to uniquely identify a variation of the response if there are multiple cached responses for a resource. 当响应依赖于一组客户端输入 (如标头、参数或内容编码) 时, 这非常有用。This is useful when a response depends on a set of client inputs, such as headers, parameters, or content encodings. 类不与 HTTP 缓存控制标头直接关联。The class is not directly related to HTTP cache-control headers. 但是, 它有助于确保对客户端或代理的响应因指定的内容编码而异。However, it helps make sure that a response to a client or a proxy varies by the specified content encoding. 将缓存设置为随内容编码而变化使 ASP.NET 可以根据`Accept-Encoding`标头改变响应。Setting the cache to vary by content encoding enables ASP.NET to vary the response by the `Accept-Encoding` header. 处理请求时, `Accept-Encoding`将检查标头并标识第一个可接受的编码, 并将其用于执行以下操作之一:When a request is processed, the `Accept-Encoding` header is checked and the first acceptable encoding is identified and used to take one of the following actions: - 如果也在列表中找到了匹配的编码, 并且存在缓存的响应, 则发送缓存的响应。If a matching encoding is also found in the list and a cached response exists, the cached response is sent. - 如果也在列表中找到了匹配的编码, 但缓存的响应不存在, 则将生成响应并将其插入缓存中。If a matching encoding is also found in the list but a cached response does not exist, a response is generated and inserted into the cache. - 如果在列表中找不到匹配的编码, 则会搜索缓存的非编码响应, 也称为 "标识响应"。If a matching encoding is not found in the list, the cache is searched for a non-encoded response, also referred to as the identity response. 如果找到了标识响应, 则发送。If the identity response is found, it is sent. 否则, 将生成新的非编码响应, 并将其存储在缓存中。Otherwise a new non-encoded response is generated and stored in the cache. 有关属性的详细信息, 请参阅 RFC 2616:超文本传输协议-HTTP/1.1, 在[万维网联合会 (W3C)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)网站上提供。For more information about the property, see RFC 2616: Hypertext Transfer Protocol -- HTTP/1.1, available on the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). 有关完整的详细信息, 请参阅第14节 "标头字段定义"。See section 14, "Header Field Definitions", for complete details. 可以通过使用指令或将配置文件添加到 web.config 文件中的元素来设置属性。You can set the property by using the directive or by adding a profile to the element in the Web.config file. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何启用可以从输出缓存中提供的动态压缩响应。The following example shows how to enable a dynamically compressed response that can be served from the output cache. 可接受的编码为 "gzip", 并使用`VaryByContentEncodings`指令的特性设置。The encoding that is acceptable is "gzip" and is set by using the `VaryByContentEncodings` attribute of the directive. 如果承载页面的 Web 服务器未启用动态压缩, 则输出缓存将没有针对指定内容编码的缓存响应。If the Web server that hosts the page does not have dynamic compression enabled, the output cache will not have a cached response for the specified content encoding. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.HttpCachePolicy.VaryByContentEncodings#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpCachePolicy.VaryByContentEncodings/CS/default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.HttpCachePolicy.VaryByContentEncodings#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpCachePolicy.VaryByContentEncodings/VB/default.aspx#1)]
